Once upon a time, in a small village, a brilliant star named Liora grew weary of the endless night sky. Longing for adventure, she twinkled brightly, catching the attention of a curious girl named Elara. One fateful night, Liora made a daring leap from the heavens, transforming into a glowing crystal that landed softly in Elaraâ€™s garden. Enchanted, Elara discovered that Liora held the power to grant wishes. As they forged a friendship, Elara learned that true magic lay not in wishes, but in kindness. Together, they spread joy throughout the village, reminding everyone that the stars are never far away.
